text: Saissetia is a genus of soft scale insects in the family Coccidae. There are at least four described species in Saissetia. ==Species== * Saissetia coffeae (Walker, 1852) (hemispherical scale) * Saissetia miranda (Cockerell and Parrott, 1899) * Saissetia neglecta De Lotto, 1969 * Saissetia oleae (Olivier, 1791) ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Sternorrhyncha genera Category:Coccidae
title: Saissetia
